title: hostmaria
author: hostmaria
content: Yes, SnowflakeX is another exchange has scammed us ($Maria coin) and our community.If you have time > maybe you can dig up more information on the owner Kevin?I have put up the basic information that should be enough to locate and frame him: https://maria.zone/index.php/topic,139.new.htmlthere should be much more out there..---just publish it here
